data.description: DCI Marketing, Inc.As a part of the global industrial organization Marmon Holdings—which is backed by Berkshire Hathaway—you’ll be doing things that matter, leading at every level, and winning a better way. We’re committed to making a positive impact on the world, providing you with diverse learning and working opportunities, and fostering a culture where everyone’s empowered to be their best.DCI Marketing is re-imagining how brands engage with retail customers. We design and deliver immersive environments that bring automotive and consumer brands to life, combining physical fixtures with digital experiences backed by data. Together, these elements transform retail spaces into powerful drivers of growth. Our people are problem-solvers who turn complex challenges into experiences that feel purposeful and built for growth. As part of Marmon Holdings, Inc., a Berkshire Hathaway company, we bring the resources and stability of a global organization to our craft-driven, agile team.DCI Marketing develops retail merchandising solutions for global brands and retailers. Using consumer insights and a retail science-based methodology. The company specializes in retail environments, merchandising displays, digital merchandising, marketing programs, audit solutions, and facility image products. This position is in the DCI Marketing Data Team.As a Digital Production Engineering Intern, you’ll help keep projects organized and moving forward while learning how digital activations are built: from concept to deployment. You’ll sit at the intersection of design, development, and client needs, supporting the team with task management and day-to-day coordination.WHAT YOU'LL DO:Help Manage ProjectsCreate and track tasks in Jira (or similar tools)Assist with timelines, deliverables, and communication between teamsSit in on sprint planning and standups to see how projects flow Support ProductionAssist with kiosks, apps, and games (think: a Toyota EV quiz, Ford Mustang timeline, or an Unreal Engine simulator)Document issues and follow them through resolutionPitch in on content updates and file organization Keep Things OrganizedCapture meeting notes, status updates, and client requestsHelp build simple reports that show progress and next steps Learn the ProcessSee how our team builds apps with Angular/Electron, dashboards with Firebase, and immersive 3D experiences with UnrealExplore new trends in experiential and digital activations, and share ideas with the teamWhat You’ll Gain:Exposure to real client work for brands like Toyota, Subaru, Ford, and Mirion MedicalA front-row seat to how digital activations are built, from kickoff to deploymentMentorship from a tight-knit team of anticipated pay rate for this role is $27.00/hour. ***Following receipt of a conditional offer of employment, candidates will be required to complete additional job-related screening processes as If you require any reasonable accommodation to complete your application or any part of the recruiting process, please email your request to careers@marmon.com, and please be sure to include the title and the location of the position for which you are applying.
